pages.text: The $(mob)Myrmex Queen$() is a miniboss. One is found in each functional $(thing)Myrmex Hive$().$(p)It stays in its room, laying eggs to hatch new $(mob)Myrmexes$() to grow its hive and attacking intruders with its bite and its venomous stinger. Killing it prevents new $(mob)Myrmexes$() from being born, eventually causing the $(thing)Myrmex Hive$() to die out.
